title: The Sleepy Surprise Club Trilogy
description: In this trilogy of taboo stories, three different women pay forward the love that is possible with Michael's (from the 'A Sleepy Surprise' trilogy of stories) special hot chocolate.Faculty members, entire football teams and best friends all have their way with these inexperienced women. Oh, and let's not forget the men of their houses, they've got to have some of the action too, right? And the man of the house doesn't need to use protection.
author: Scarlett Skyes
